Interface Strategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
AggressiveStrategy, BenevolentStrategy, CheaterStrategy, HumanStrategy, RandomStrategy
public interface Strategy
The `Strategy` interface defines the contract for implementing various game strategies. Classes implementing this interface must provide logic for creating orders, generating card orders, and retrieving neighboring countries during gameplay.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<String>
    createOrder(GamePhaseHandler p_gamePhaseHandler, Player p_currentPlayer)
    Creates a list of orders for the current player during the game phase.
    String

    Generates a card order for the current player based on the prioritized card type.
    Country

    Retrieves a neighboring country of the given country for the current player.

  • Method Details

    • createOrder

      List<String> createOrder(GamePhaseHandler p_gamePhaseHandler, Player p_currentPlayer)
      Creates a list of orders for the current player during the game phase.
      Parameters:
      p_gamePhaseHandler - The handler managing the current game phase.
      p_currentPlayer - The player for whom the orders are being created.
      Returns:
      A list of orders as strings.

    • generateCardOrder

      String generateCardOrder(GamePhaseHandler p_gameManager, Player p_currentPlayer, String p_prioritizeCard)
      Generates a card order for the current player based on the prioritized card type.
      Parameters:
      p_gameManager - The handler managing the current game phase.
      p_currentPlayer - The player for whom the card order is being generated.
      p_prioritizeCard - The type of card to prioritize when generating the order.
      Returns:
      A string representing the generated card order.

    • getNeighbour

      Country getNeighbour(Country p_country, Map p_gameMap, Player p_currentPlayer)
      Retrieves a neighboring country of the given country for the current player.
      Parameters:
      p_country - The country for which a neighbor is to be found.
      p_gameMap - The map of the game containing all countries and their connections.
      p_currentPlayer - The player for whom the neighboring country is being retrieved.
      Returns:
      A neighboring country of the given country.
